resources.string:
You just woke up from a scary dream. 
As you open your eyes you look around and you find yourself trapped into a small dark room. 
The room is empty and on the other side you see a shadow with large green eyes staring down at you. 
Suddenly the shadow starts speaking: 
Hello stranger. 
I am Zurtok the mighty and you are my prisoner. 
If you want to leave this room alive you must answer six questions correctly. 
If you fail you will die...
 You can however choose the category of the answers. 
Decide wisely as your life depends on it...
Tell me your Name or suffer the consequences!

After choosing the category the shadow split into pieces. 
It changed in to all kinds of shapes and sizes. 
From tall temples to maps and tools. 
Although the green eyes that were starring at you disappeared into the darkness, you can still feel the ill intentions of the shadow... 
Once again Zurtok's voice spread through the room, echoing from all the pieces combined. 
For your sake I hope you chose correctly... 
Now lets begin with the questions..
This is my first question. \nWhen did Christopher Columbus reach America for the first time?
Ok. Next... \nWho was the god of thunder in greek mythology?
Don\'t think that i will go easy on you.... The next one is tricky... \nWhich of the names below belong to norse mythology gods?
You think you are doing great but... \nWhich year did the Berlin wall fall?
You look tired and we still have two more questions... \nWhat was the purpose of the egyptian pyramids?
Finally... \nWhich of the countries below are considered UK\ territories?

It changed in to all kinds of shapes and sizes. 
From tall trees to black fire and symbols.
